item.author: Stan Bogdanov
item.appdesc:
You can access some of Adelphi's essential informations on your smartphone, including:
  • Today at Adelphi
  • Shuttle Schedule
  • Shuttle Schedule
  • Campus Directory
  • Library Resources
  • Athletics news and events
  • AU PAC Showtimes
  • Art Exhibitions
  • Academic Calendar
  • Where Am I (Campus map)

On your smartphone, just open your browser application and type in m.adelphi.edu. Bookmark it for future use!
